posts.author: BarbarianBob
posts.content:
How do other DMs balance encounters that involve subclass? I find it either makes combats too easy or too difficult.

I think the 2024 changes to subclass make it much more balanced compared to before.

The way I understand the rules for subclass, it should work like this: when you take the action, you need to roll ability checks to determine the outcome.

In my campaign, we had a situation with subclass that played out really well. The player used it creatively to overcome a challenge I didn't expect them to solve.
